style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">看到别人成功了，我们第一时间想到的总是乖乖跟在后面走，去抄袭别人的成功，完全没有自己的定位，没有自己的核心内容，看似路好走很多，其实是越走越窄，粉丝也会左摇右摆流失得很快。因此，在刚刚开始做微信营销推广的时候，就要给自己定好位，确定服务群体，找准自己的核心价值。做品牌推广的，要想清楚你想树立的是怎样的品牌形象，传播怎么样的企业文化</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">?</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">品牌做微信营销的目的是什么？如果是兴趣类的话，你要吸引的细分受众是哪些</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">?</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">他们有什么样的特点？我要用什么样的内容来吸引他们的眼球，引起他们的兴趣</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">?</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">一个独特有个性的定位，才不至于在日后运营的过程中迷失方向。如果你的平台已经运营了一段时间了，你可以参照后台的数据，对用户的群体进行划分，对用户的行为爱好做数据分析，要知道用户想要的是什么</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">;</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">分析完之后如果你还是理不出头绪，建议你还是从头再来，这可比漫长的整理转化简单得多。</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">方向找准了，那要怎样做内容</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">?</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">1</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">、剑走偏锋。总有那么些经典，连转发的人都说不清理由，也没有读完，就是觉得文章很赞、很经典，一定要转，这样才能证明自己的眼界够宽或其他。这是怎么做到的？我们来看看两条被视为经典的定律：</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">1)</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">论点独到，填补大众认知空白，或不明觉厉的观点</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">;</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">2)</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">被用户认定是第一时间发布的消息。有两个重点</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">——“</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">观点</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">”</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">和</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">“</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">快速</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">”!</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">做到这两点，转发一般都会很高。</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">2</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">、干货十足。信息爆炸时代知识膨胀，试想一下如果是一篇干货十足、没有废话的文章，是不是更有与他人分享的价值</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">?</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">哪怕你是写写八卦，你也要足够有料啊。写得有趣、有观点、有独特的视角、有看点，把其他的八卦全部压下去，这样才会有更多的人关注你。</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">3</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">、卖情怀。现在的人总是爱公开自己的情绪，各种的签名、状态功能层出不穷正说明了这一点。用户转发内容，绝大部分是用来抒发自己的情绪、思想和情怀的，说到底你还是要走用户的心。如果你正好是卖心灵鸡汤的，你的内容就要有足够的力量让用户心灵澎湃，要让用户觉得你就是他的知己，是可以交心的朋友</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">!</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">4</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">、细节很重要。</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">细节主要体现在标题、排版、配图这三块。</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">1</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">）标题：当用户看到你文章标题有眼前一亮的感觉你就成功了一大半，提不起用户阅读的兴趣，转发更无从谈起</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">;</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">当然也不要去做标题党，这样只会损害公众号的形象得不偿失。</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">2)</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">排版：排版要注意美观简洁，并不断更新形式，给用户最佳的阅读体验。</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">3)</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">配图：封面配图要切题，要和标题一样具有诱惑性，图不搭题会显得很不专业</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">;</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">文中配图更要与内容搭配的经典到位，最好不加水印，方便用户保存使用。</span><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:12px/30px \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">优秀的内容才能带来持续的转发传播，当大家都在抄袭的时候，好的内容就显得更加可贵。大家都会认为抄袭可耻，但是个人认为抄袭并不可怕，可怕的是你不懂得变通，不懂得利用自己的观点做内容，很好的融合进去，改编成符合自己风格的内容，抄袭这事情也得看人。或许这里面也存在一个工作心态和精益求精的问题。</span></span> \r\n</p>','uploads/image/20151118/1447843880.jpg','','116','195','1447257600','true','','0');
INSERT INTO `pmw_infolist11111` VALUES('155','1','4','0','0,','-1','-1','','豆腐一年卖6亿 跨界营销延伸品牌那都是随便玩玩的 你行么？','','','','微玖仟','陈莹','','','日本全新概念豆腐品牌——“男前豆腐”，意即“男子气概豆腐店”，打破了做“标准豆腐”的传统，将豆腐的概念、造型、产品、包装、产业链延伸等进行了革命性改良，这种做法使品牌很标新立异。','<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1.5;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\">2015年男前豆腐预计实现110亿日元营业额（约6亿人民币）。</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">定位差异化</strong> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	2005年，日本京都的伊藤信吾接手父亲的豆腐老店后，不满足于“三块豆腐100日元”的卖法，想要打破几十年卖“标准豆腐”的传统。于是，他和几个华裔、欧美人士创立了一种全新概念的豆腐品牌——男前豆腐。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	伊藤信吾要做不一样的豆腐，先从产品下手。男前豆腐把传统豆腐造型进行改良，做成了水滴形等异形，将豆腐放入瘦长型或琵琶型的塑料容器里，并命名为男前豆腐店，意即“男子气概豆腐店”。异形豆腐一下子区别于市场上的标准豆腐，差异化让男前豆腐迅速打响品牌。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	软软的豆腐变成了男子汉的象征，给消费者的认知和感官带来了很大的冲击，这种做法一下子从众多的日本豆腐品牌中脱颖而出，许多日本人买不到男前豆腐，也会预定购买，因为他们要的就是这种潇洒的感觉。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916114456_861.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916114458_266.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916114646_721.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">精耕产品和包装</strong> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	形成品牌特色后，伊藤信吾着力在开发具有“男性魅力”的产品力上下功夫，在原料、工艺、口感三方面实施了对应“男性魅力”概念的产品力开发。与产品力相配合，为产品的特性赋予了全新的符号化演绎。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	在这之后，伊藤信吾把过去豆腐易散易碎、方方正正的刻板造型，转换成异型的包装，塑造了制作豆腐的新标准，打破消费者以往对豆腐的认知，产生好奇的心理，重新改变了豆腐这个传统食品的价值。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	男前豆腐的所有商品命名和包装都走独特创意风，跟店名相同的「男前豆腐」、做成像桨一样的「吹风的豆腐店JOHNNY」(日文原名:风に吹かれて豆腐屋のジョニー)、做成饭匙样春夏限定的「吵架至上凉拌豆腐小子」(喧哗上等やっこ野郎)、秋冬限定的「吵架至上汤豆腐小子」(喧哗上等汤豆腐野郎)、男-TOMOTSU、绿大豆制豆腐「OJOE」(お嬢)等。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916114742_270.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916114743_545.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916114746_966.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">跨界营销</strong> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	男前豆腐店的高人气也让日本玩具大厂BANDAI找上门，将其8种豆腐产品制成扭蛋玩具，将豆腐店热潮再蔓延到玩具上。除了跟玩具厂商的结合外，“男前豆腐店”也从网站跨足到手机上，将该网站所出的4首独特歌曲《JOHNNY联合》(日文原名:ジャにー连合)、《豆腐店的摇滚乐》(日文原名:豆腐屋のロケンロ)等变成可以下载的来电铃声跟来电歌曲，除此之外，“男前豆腐店”的商标图案也制成待机图案跟Flash游戏，甚至提供网站上JOHNNY的喊叫声变成手机来电声音。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	另外，男前豆腐店还曾发售过与人气动漫《海贼王》共同开发的“乔巴豆腐”。伊藤信吾解释说该企划的目的是希望让那些平时很少吃豆腐的人，在享受乐趣的同时，品尝美味的豆腐。乔巴豆腐的包装上印有路飞、山治及乔巴的图像，都是男前豆腐的原创设计，特殊容器也使豆腐上再现了乔巴的脸部。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916114900_458.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916115025_943.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916115104_23.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:left;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">延伸品牌价值</strong> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	男前豆腐具有独特的可识别个性形象之后，伊藤信吾将“男前豆腐”的品牌符号物化，利用创意形成创意产业链，不断延伸其品牌价值，自己开发、生产、销售周边产品。小编登陆男前豆腐官网，发现在导航条上单独有一栏叫“货品架”，下设衍生品分类为：T恤衫-外套；围裙-小物件；贴纸；音乐产品，共四大类、三十一款产品。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	从一块豆腐延伸到时尚网站、玩具、流行音乐，从产品单一的功能营养价值，上升为表达自我，追求时尚潮流的精神体验价值，实现了从低附加值、低关注度到高附加值、高关注度的跃升，开辟了“时尚豆腐”的流行潮流，创造了一个特别的蓝海市场，这充分说明，比产品更重要的是产品背后的价值和意义。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" title=\"\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916115206_3.jpg\" width=\"500\" height=\"588\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916115304_32.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	<img style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;vertical-align:middle;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"mycls\" alt=\"\" src=\"http://image.meihua.info:808/editor/2015/09/16/20150916115408_99.jpg\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 25px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:block;font:16px/30px \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Open Sans\', Arial, \'Microsoft YaHei\', 微软雅黑, STHeiti, \'WenQuanYi Micro Hei\', SimSun, sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;-webkit-margin-before:1em;-webkit-margin-after:1em;-webkit-margin-start:0px;-webkit-margin-end:0px;\">\r\n	男前豆腐的种种营销做法都站在了时尚、前卫、潮流和文化的前沿，许多日本人买不到男前豆腐，也会预定购买，因为他们要的就是这种潇洒和吃东西“吃到”观赏、文化和创意的感觉。虽然从来没有花费过广告费用，但是，男前豆腐大胆创新的改造豆腐品牌行销模式，精耕产品与包装，从而引起媒体和消费者的自发关注与宠爱。<br style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1.5;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\">2015年，伊藤信吾的梦想是把男前豆腐做到110亿日元销售额的规模（约6亿人民币），据了解，2010年男前豆腐卖出2亿人民币，2014年卖出4亿元。2015年上半年营收已经超过3亿元，实现目标指日可待。</span> style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">同时企业微信在这个过程中没有达到粉丝当初关注时的期望值；另一方面企业公众平台的运营人员也迷失了方向</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">不知道平台能做什么，能提供什么</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">时间一长便走进了越努力越没有效果的恶性循环。我这个平台给客户带去什么</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">?</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">他们为什么要关注我</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">?</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">微信营销跟其他的营销手段有什么不同</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">?</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">应该如何让去运营</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">?下面一起来讨论一下，</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">个人看法，欢迎拍砖。</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:10px 0px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\"><br style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\" />\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:#C6C6C7 1px solid;padding-bottom:0px;margin:-0.5em auto 40px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#000000;font-size:26px;padding-top:0px;\">1、明确定位</span> \r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:10px 0px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:0em;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	〉\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:0em;text-indent:2em;margin:-8px 0px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;opacity:0.5;\">\r\n	〉\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:0em;text-indent:2em;margin:-8px 0px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;opacity:0.2;\">\r\n	〉\r\n</p>\r\n</section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:0px;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\"></section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:0px;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\"></section></section>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">在之前的微博营销浪潮的影响之下</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">我们的整个思维都被</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">“</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">微博化</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">”</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">了</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">觉得运营嘛，不就是每天推推广告</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">搞搞活动、大号转发和事件炒作</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">知道微信营销来了我们还停留在把微信作为发广告</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">做推送的免费通道的思维阶段。问题在于微博是基于弱关系链的</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">“</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">喇叭</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">”,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">而微信是强关系链的</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">“</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">悄悄话</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">”</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">，因此沿用以前做微博的思维来做微信营销显然是不可取的。</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">在微博里我们可以肆无忌惮发送无关痛痒的信息，谁看都可以</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">微信公众平台却给人更多的私密空间</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">,</span><span style=\"text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">只有建立了联系才可以看得到。微博更偏向于宣传渠道，其目的告诉大家我有什么，起到引流的目的；微信公众平台更关系的是客户需要什么，倾向于服务。如果只是做做活动高品宣，没有持续有效的服务的话，这个平台对于粉丝而言渐渐地也就没有了价值，粉丝也就这样流失了。</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<img sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;height:auto !important;border-top:medium none;border-right:medium none;padding-top:0px;\" data-type=\"jpeg\" data-s=\"300,640\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\" class=\"e7editor\" data-id=\"118\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"e7wei\" data-id=\"85832\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:#C6C6C7 1px solid;padding-bottom:0px;margin:-0.5em auto 40px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box VALUES('184','1','4','0','0,','-1','-1','','营销难，微信营销更难，你真的选对方法了吗？实用有效的微信运营推广五则','','','','微玖仟','','','','微信营销、微信推广是现在的热门，它既可以作为企业对外展示的门户入口，也可以做成定制化具有企业特色的高效智能服务平台，做到有针对性的，精准的营销推广。但是想好做好微信营销也不容易，怎样才能做好微信营销呢？','<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	在讲微信营销之前让我们先来聊一聊传统广告营销，传统的广告营销模式无非花大价钱做做电视广告户外广告，在短时间内让很多的人看到你的广告知道你的品牌，这样广告的时效是很快的，但来得快去得也快这样的效果也只是暂时的，一旦不投入效果自然也就没了，这样的一次性宣传，高额持续的广告经费投入，对于资本不是太厚的企业还是很有压力。有没有低投入高产出的方法呢？\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	公众平台要做的是把目标粉丝引进来，然后通过内容、活动、服务来培养忠实的粉丝，提供的是推广展示兼服务的一站式推广，能够长期带来宣传的，显然这种低成本高效益的宣传更受企业的欢迎，能够给企业带来的品牌宣传效果以及效益都是长期持续有效的。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	微信推广、微信运营很多人都在关注，大家都想做微信营销，但这也是非常难的一项工作。但是对于很大一部分的公司来说没有运营推广的经验，做起来困难不说，还不一定有效果。但是不管做什么事情都是有技巧的，就看怎么去把握了。公众平台营销推广的方法很多，但是常用有效的就那么几个。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/22px 微软雅黑, \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\" class=\"e7editor\" data-id=\"118\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"e7wei\" data-id=\"85832\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:10px 0px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\"><br style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\" />\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:#c6c6c7 1px solid;padding-bottom:0px;margin:-0.5em !important;height:10px;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:20px;padding-top:0px;\">1、软实力推广</span></strong> \r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:10px 0px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:0em;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	〉\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:0em;text-indent:2em;margin:-8px 0px 0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;opacity:0.5;\">\r\n	〉\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:0em;text-indent:2em;margin:-8px 0px 0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;opacity:0.2;\">\r\n	〉\r\n</p>\r\n</section></section></section></section>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	软文推广比较适合企业做产品宣传，自媒体类公众号也比较适合用软文方法推广。编写软文，发布到热门大流量的网站平台。点击量足够大的话，就可以吸引吸引不少的粉丝关注，重点的话还是在于软文的质量。在写文章的时候提一下自己的公众号，很多的微信营销人在一开始的时候都是用这种方法吸引了很多粉丝的关注。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/25px 微软雅黑, \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/22px 微软雅黑, \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word class=\"e7editor\" data-id=\"118\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"e7wei\" data-id=\"85832\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:#c6c6c7 1px solid;padding-bottom:0px;margin:-0.5em auto 40px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;color:#333333;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:20px;padding-top:0px;\">2、适当互推</span></strong><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:justify;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:28px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#333333;font-size:26px;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:10px 0px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:0em;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	〉\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:0em;text-indent:2em;margin:-8px 0px 0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;opacity:0.5;\">\r\n	〉\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:0em;text-indent:2em;margin:-8px 0px 0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;clear:both;padding-top:0px;opacity:0.2;\">\r\n	〉\r\n</p>\r\n</section></section></section></section>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	微信官方是严禁公众号进行互推跟引导关注的，但是呢我们还是可以适当地去做推广的，但是这得把握好尺度，已经被微信官方认定并禁止的推广方法就一定不要去做，否则被封号的话就一朝回到解放前了。推荐公众号的时候尽量做到要隐蔽一些，语言上不能太过于直接，推荐一个账号就行，不能在底部加一大堆的推广账号，同时也影响了页面美观。这种顺带推荐的方法效果还是不错的。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px sans-serif;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:0px;border-left:0px;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/22px 微软雅黑, \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;border-top:0px;border-right:0px;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\" class=\"e7editor\" data-id=\"118\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"e7wei\" data-id=\"85832\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box
