瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\">H5</span>也并没有你想象的那么简单，就像你做了很久的微信营销也还没有挣到很多的钱，但是，只要你再坚持一点，再努力一点，你就一定会发光出彩的。</span> \r\n</p>','uploads/image/20151112/1447320188.jpg','','106','44','1447257600','true','','0');
INSERT INTO `pmw_infolist11111` VALUES('187','1','4','0','0,','-1','-1','','微信营销，以微见大','','','','微玖仟','','','','微营销这两年伴随着微信的火热而在网络兴起，异军突起的他在营销方面的实力让很多营销公司对其刮目相看。','<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">小平台做营销在以往的营销人员看来是行不通的小路，以往的营销门道奉行广撒网，大鱼小鱼抓到一个是一个。只是很多人并没有注意到捞到很多鱼的那张网因为网孔太大漏掉了许多小鱼，即使是奉行护渔原则，也没有注重培养潜在的微小客户。小鱼由于自身微小而不被注意，但小鱼终会长大，小鱼也有自身尽管微小的不为人知的消费需求，甚至小鱼只是从未了解过撒网着所要强制他们了解的领域。</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/23px 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<img style=\"border-bottom:medium 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">而微营销，就是为小鱼打开视角，为潜在的客户做定向宣传。那么谁是小鱼，想想在我们做营销的时候我们所面向的客户大多都是陌生人，好不熟悉没有交集的陌生人。而面对自己周边的人，由于平时有经常联系，是好友，亲人，同学，朋友的朋友等等，我们同出了一个朋友圈，微博圈，或者</span>qq<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">空间，我们通过对方的社交网络和日常联系或多或少的对对方有一定程度的了解，了解他们的需求，生活习惯，日常爱好等等，这一切的了解成为我们的营销的资源信息，掌握信息是做好营销的第一步。拥有了这么多微小客户，同时又完全掌握他们的个人信息，这样丰富的资源不费吹灰之力。他们，就是我们之前一直忽视的可以作为营销对象的客户。</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/23px 瀹嬩綋;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">而要对他们做推广营销，如传统营销行业那样强行推销的方法是行不痛的，就像现在很多人开始在微信做个人代购，每天在朋友圈发各种代购图文刷屏，相信大多数人看到这样的霸屏这关系稍微浅的早就立马拉黑无视了。而做成微信公众号，每天定时发送文章，用软文的方式做微营销推广，既让人觉得容易接受，没准还会对你所推广的内容就产生兴趣了。就像顾爷，粉丝们明明知道人家天天发文都是在做广告，却心甘情愿的点击开从头看到尾，人家以内容为王为先做微营销，注重品质，是微营销一个很成功的的典范。内容为王的微营销，这点我们以后再谈。总之微营销要主营方式和软文质量，这个是必然。</span><img style=\"border-bottom:medium none;border-left:medium none;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, _src=\"https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/Y68fVDqbV9SMwoXWHxaicdSFe67jWkQiaNTtdBsQkic5wicSg3hVNXq6icwicZUXneZpkiaXVXmFvqIKP6HP9cwRPib9uQ/0?wx_fmt=jpeg\" data-w=\"472\" data-ratio=\"0.5847457627118644\" data-type=\"jpeg\" data-s=\"300,640\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">你会说，其实我的朋友圈，社交网络所加的人并不多啊，做这样的微营销有什么用，看到的人根本没几个。其实有在质量保证在先的话，你这样想完全就是错误的。美国社会心理学家米尔格伦曾提出著名的“六度分割理论”，你和任何一个陌生人之间所间隔的人不会超过五个人，也就是说，最多通过五个人你就能认识任何一个陌生人。是的，特别是现在社交网络的胜行，你完全可以通过一个人的微博就可以认识到他的其他好友并聊上天。社交网络让人际交往的成本越来越低，门槛也是如此。所以，别怕交不到朋友，就怕你自我封闭。社交网络，人际网络是可以拓宽的。并且，现在猪怕壮，而人人争着抢着要出名。</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">所以微营销完全是可以以微见大，以微做大的，关键是你如何运营，如何管理好这个平台。</span> \r\n</p>','uploads/image/20151118/1447839052.jpg','','161','187','1447257600','true','','0');

style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">随着移动网络的快速发展，微信营销迅速占领了移动营销阵地，企业官方、红人大号、草根自媒体各方力量齐齐涌入微信营销阵营，满足了大众再小的个体也有自己的品牌的诉求！微信营销号称是草根营销但又不完完全全是，简单地说就是你想做微信营销可以，但是想做好做精真的是太难太难。今天浅浅地谈一谈微信营销、微信推广的基本功，大神请飘过，小白一起学习、共勉。</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/23px 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">一、公众号名称突出重点</span></strong></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/23px 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">俗话说人如其名，可见有一个好听易记朗朗上口的名字是相当的重要的，在同质化严重的云云微信营销海洋里，你第一步要做的就是让别人记住你而且要印象深刻，那么你的第一步就成功了。怎样才能让大家看一眼就能记住我的公众号名称呢？当然这个并不难做到。无非就是两种画风，第一种就是精妙绝伦唯美到不能再唯美，外加一点点悬念；如果说这个实在是太难了，臣妾做不到啊，那么还有一种就是奇葩搞怪毁三观风。（要提醒的是千万不能在里面加料，你懂的，虽然有人通过这样的方式取得可观的数字，但是没有一个有好下场的，不然被封号了都还不知道怎么</span>si<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">的。）</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/23px 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<img style=\"border-bottom:medium none;border-left:medium none;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;height:auto !important;border-top:medium none;border-right:medium none;padding-top:0px;\" src=\"https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/Y68fVDqbV9SMwoXWHxaicdSFe67jWkQiaN0Tib7rlJQ5XKpzQ1iaFh0o2FaBJu6XS8Ghtd4WyaHYOBhFqThJ3P5Q4Q/0?wx_fmt=png\" data-s=\"300,640\" data-type=\"png\" data-ratio=\"0.5847457627118644\" data-w=\"472\" _src=\"https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/Y68fVDqbV9SMwoXWHxaicdSFe67jWkQiaN0Tib7rlJQ5XKpzQ1iaFh0o2FaBJu6XS8Ghtd4WyaHYOBhFqThJ3P5Q4Q/0?wx_fmt=png\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/23px 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/23px 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\"><strong style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">二、内容不够标题来凑？</span></strong></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/23px 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\"><br style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;padding-top:0px;\" />\r\n</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/2em 微软雅黑;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:宋体;font-size:18px;padding-top:0px;\">推送图文没人看阅读量太低？这跟我们的标题可有大关系，俗话说题如文眼，用户在收到图文推送的时候，能够看到的仅仅是标题和背景图，能不能吸引用户点击阅读就看标题的功力了。在标题优化方面尽量用一些震撼冲击心灵的词语，做到精而简，把要表达的意思表达恰当到位，留点悬念吸引用户点击阅读，尽量不要出现事件的结果，能够引起用户的好奇心那么你就成功了。但是要谨慎过于夸张标题还有与文无关标题，简单地说就是做标题党要谨慎，天花乱坠、劲爆的标题可以吸引用户眼球，能在短时间内获得可观的阅读点击量，但其实是在透支用户的信任，当用户不再相信你了你做多努力也是然并卵，做微信营销的扎扎实实做内容才是最实际。</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:5px 0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/23px 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;\">我有一个姑姑之前也下了水，做起了微信营销，可是呢，现在也乖乖的去找工作上班了。仅仅没挣到钱还算是好的，小心“赔了夫人又折兵”。在你热血沸腾想加入微信营销大军的时候，是不是会第一时间想到去加代理，代理会是免费加的么？怎么可能，他们为了过滤掉一些没有毅力的人，会告诉你要先交</span><span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;\">XX</span><span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;\">人民币的保证金，要一次性进</span><span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;\">XX</span><span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;\">货并付清货款，卖不卖的出去，谁管你呢。朋友们是不是想到了传销，洗脑，放饵，钓鱼···那些在朋友圈卖货大都是挣的代理下线的钱，然后一层一层的发展下去。</span><span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;text-indent:21pt;line-height:30px;white-space:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;\">朋友们就要问了，是不是我们就不能做微信营销了呢？答案当然是否定的。微信这样大好的平台，不做营销不是可惜了么。重点是微信营销要怎么做才能真正的挣钱。</span><span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;\"></span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"center\" style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, \r\n</p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;text-indent:21pt;line-height:30px;white-space:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;\">在这个微信营销鱼龙混杂的时间段里，我们如果做真正好的产品，做能够与市场与客户产生共鸣的产品，做真正有价值有意义的事，不卖假货仿货，我们总是会脱颖而出的。最重要的是，我们不能被大环境所污染，不要为了一时的急功近利而落入了陷阱。</span></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;text-indent:21pt;line-height:30px;white-space:normal;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:微软雅黑, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"margin:0px;padding:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft 瀹嬩綋;font-size:16px;\">产品之外，微信营销推广也是不可或缺的。我们一样不能放松警惕，市面上很多很多微信营销软件，让你的粉丝分分钟上千上万，然而那些所谓的僵尸粉除了让你的微信号看起来漂亮一点之外还有什么用，并且我们还要冒着被封号的危险。所以不要想着一开微信号，马上无数粉丝好友了，微信营销没有你想象中那么容易。我们除了加好友粉丝以外，还必须要知道我们要加的是对我们的产品有兴趣的对口的好友粉丝。</span><span 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">用户更愿意分享怎样的内容</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"box-sizing:border-box 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">1.主题积极，让人感到兴奋的</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	能够激起读者情感反应的文章比对读者情绪毫无影响的文章受欢迎，进而能够带来快乐情绪的文章比带来悲伤情绪的文章受欢迎。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">2.让人非常愤怒和恐慌的</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	虽然让读者乐观积极的内容更受欢迎，但如果激起足够激烈的用户情绪，比如愤怒和恐慌，文章被分享的概率也很高。像政治丑闻和引发癌症高发的因素等内容。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">3.显示自己聪明、消息灵通、见多识广的</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	读者在分享一些内容时，往往想表达这个内容我能明白，或者增强自己在朋友中间“消息灵通”的形象。对用户而言，分享这些内容是提高自己在社交圈形象的方式。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">4.实用且容易记住的</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	之所以“榜单”性质的文章很受欢迎，是因为它们简单、实用且容易被记住。一方面用户在分享实用性质的内容时，会觉得自己在帮助朋友，另一方面容易记住的内容会随时被拿出来作为谈资。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section !important;height:8px;border-right-color:#ff8124;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;border-radius:100%;\"></section></section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:0px;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\"></section></section>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">5.有价值的故事</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	人们喜欢有故事性的内容，故事能激发人们的兴趣，被分享的可能性就高。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;text-indent:0px;margin:15px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:14px/2em \'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	分享的必要条件\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	第一，用户必须有机会看到你的内容；\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	第二，用户必须确实看到你的内容；\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	第三，内容必须能够引起他们的反应并让他们产生分享意愿。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#fefefe;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px -4px !important;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">1.用户缺乏对你的信任</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	如果人们怀疑内容的可靠性和真实性，他们就不会分享。2011EdelmanTrustBarometer研究发现全球只有56%的人相信企业会以做“正确的事”为导向。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	要点：第一步是让人觉得你值得信任，要积极与粉丝公开对话，并表现诚恳，不畏惧批评。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/25px \'Helvetica Neue\', Helvetica, \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#3e3e3e;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\" class=\"135editor\" data-id=\"29735\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:#ff8124 1px solid;border-left:#ff8124 1px 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;border-top:#ff8124 1px solid;border-right:#ff8124 1px solid;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:-8px 0px 0px 140px;padding-left:0px;width:229px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"50%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft !important;height:8px;border-right-color:#ff8124;font-size:18px;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;border-radius:100%;\"></section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:2em;margin:15px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#3e3e3e;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"135brush\" data-style=\"text-indent: 2em;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">2.你的品牌对用户并不重要</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	事实上，粉丝对品牌的记忆总是短期的，他们会问：“你的品牌最近给我带来了什么价值吗”?\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	粉丝需要的是有价值的信息，优惠的产品，及寻找到志同道合者的机会。即便粉丝并不会忠诚于品牌，但需要让他们对你提供的信息抱有兴趣。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	要点：确定你对粉丝的价值，并持续提供这些价值，如果能超越他们的预期当然更好。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">3.你的内容很无聊</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	用户更愿意分享他们认为有趣，搞笑的内容。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	要点：让公司的创意人员把幽默元素加入分享的内容吧。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/25px 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;border-top:#ff8124 1px solid;border-right:#ff8124 1px solid;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:-8px 0px 0px 140px;padding-left:0px;width:229px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"50%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:2em;margin:15px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#3e3e3e;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"135brush\" data-style=\"text-indent: 2em;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">4.人们更在意事业而非品牌</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	纽约时报发现人们更愿意分享他们关注的事物。他们会考虑能为自己关切的事情做些什么。不局限于你的品牌或产品，而让用户觉得是在参与一项有意义的事，会让他们兴奋不已。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	要点：展示品牌人性化的一面，让粉丝知道你关注的活动，给他们机会融入某项事业。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px auto 1px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;border-right-color:#ff8124;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;border-radius:100%;\"></section></section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:0px;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\"></section></section>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/25px \'Helvetica Neue\', style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/25px \'Helvetica Neue\', Helvetica, \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#3e3e3e;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\" class=\"135editor\" data-id=\"29735\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:#ff8124 1px solid;border-left:#ff8124 1px solid;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:10px;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;border-top:#ff8124 1px solid;border-right:#ff8124 1px solid;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:-8px 0px 0px 140px;padding-left:0px;width:229px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"50%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;border-right-color:#ff8124;font-size:18px;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;border-radius:100%;\"><br style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\" />\r\n</section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:2em;margin:15px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#3e3e3e;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"135brush\" data-style=\"text-indent: 2em;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">5.用户通过分享来建立和维护关系网络</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	人们看重与他人的关系而非与品牌的关系。用户需要归属感，而你的品牌可以成为归属感的平台。在纽约时报的调查中，78%的受访者表示分享链接是他们与某些朋友保持联系的唯一方式；73%的受访者表示分享内容帮助他们找到志同道合的伙伴。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	要点：评估你的内容并考虑用户愿意分享此内容的原因。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px auto 1px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;border-right-color:#ff8124;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;border-radius:100%;\"></section></section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:0px;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\"></section></section>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/25px \'Helvetica Neue\', Helvetica, \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;letter-spacing:normal;color:#3e3e3e;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/25px \'Helvetica Neue\', Helvetica, \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:#ff8124 1px solid;border-left:#ff8124 1px 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;border-top:#ff8124 1px solid;border-right:#ff8124 1px solid;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:-8px 0px 0px 140px;padding-left:0px;width:229px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"50%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:2em;margin:15px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#3e3e3e;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"135brush\" data-style=\"text-indent: 2em;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">6.用户希望获得认可</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	人们执着于获得周围人的认可，希望在朋友眼中有自己特别擅长的领域，这一点需要通过内容分享来体现。在纽约时报的调查中，68%的被访者表示分享内容就像给自己打广告，希望通过分享内容来塑造和提升个人形象。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	要点：分享那些能让转发者提升自身形象的内容。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px auto 1px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;border-right-color:#ff8124;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;border-radius:100%;\"></section></section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:0px;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\"></section></section>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:#ff8124 1px solid;border-left:#ff8124 1px 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;border-top:#ff8124 1px solid;border-right:#ff8124 1px solid;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:-8px 0px 0px 140px;padding-left:0px;width:229px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"50%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:2em;margin:15px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#3e3e3e;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"135brush\" data-style=\"text-indent: 2em;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">7.用户通过分享来管理信息</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	73%的受访者表示当他们分享一条信息时，会思考得更多更深；85%的人表示别人的评论也能帮助他们思考。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	要点：给出可以激发用户思考的内容，最好能让他们有话可说。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px auto 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;border-top:#ff8124 1px solid;border-right:#ff8124 1px solid;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:-8px 0px 0px 140px;padding-left:0px;width:229px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"50%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#3e3e3e;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"135brush\" data-style=\"text-indent: 2em;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-weight:700;padding-top:0px;\">8.你误会了你的用户</span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	MarketingPersona：提倡通过用细节描绘绝对理想用户的方式来了解用户。了解谁是你的用户可以帮助了解共同的分享动机。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	要点：根据你想沟通的群体制定差异化的内容分享战略。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px auto 1px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;border-right-color:#ff8124;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;border-radius:100%;\"></section></section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:0px;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\"></section></section>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/25px \'Helvetica Neue\', Helvetica, \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;letter-spacing:normal;color:#3e3e3e;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<br />\r\n</p>\r\n<section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/25px \'Helvetica Neue\', Helvetica, \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#3e3e3e;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\" class=\"135editor\" data-id=\"29735\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:92px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:center;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:2em;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#ff8124;border-right-color:#ff8124;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;border-right-color:#ff8124;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;padding-top:0px;\">七种</span></strong>粉丝</span></strong></span> \r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;border-bottom:#ff8124 1px solid;border-left:#ff8124 1px solid;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:10px;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;border-top:#ff8124 1px solid;border-right:#ff8124 1px solid;padding-top:0px;\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:-8px 0px 0px 140px;padding-left:0px;width:229px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"50%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;border-right-color:#ff8124;font-size:18px;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;border-radius:100%;\"></section></section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:2em;margin:15px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;color:#3e3e3e;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\" class=\"135brush\" data-style=\"text-indent: 2em;\">\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;font-size:16px;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;font-size:14px;padding-top:0px;\"></span> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	1.利他主义者(Altruists)：分享动力纯粹来自分享互助。他们希望自己被当作可靠的信息来源。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	2.事业家(Careerists)：通常受过良好教育并希望通过分享内容提高自己声誉。他们倾向于分享比较严肃和专业题材的内容。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	3.时尚褂(Hipsters)：都是生于信息时代的年轻人。他们分享最前沿的时尚创意信息，通过分享来建立自己的网络身份。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	4.自娱自乐型(Boomerangs)：只要收获评论就很满足，即使是消极的评论。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	5.纯社交型(Connectors)：通过分享内容与他人保持联系。分享内容对他们是很随意的事。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	6.信息筛选者(Selectives)：对于他们分享的内容和对象具有较高的选择性。他们对于分享内容深思熟虑并期待回复。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:30px;text-indent:2em;margin:0px;min-height:1em;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;white-space:pre-wrap;clear:both;padding-top:0px;\">\r\n	7.趋势带领者(Trendsetters)：通常是领导者，营销者，商业领袖。他们紧跟所处行业的前沿，并将信息快速有效的分享散播出去。\r\n</p>\r\n</section><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box !important;text-align:right;padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#fefefe;margin:0px 0px -4px 25px;padding-left:0px;width:297px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:10px;padding-top:0px;\" data-width=\"65%\"><section style=\"box-sizing:border-box;border-bottom-color:#ff8124;padding-bottom:0px;line-height:1;background-color:#ff8124;border-top-color:#ff8124;margin:0px auto 1px;padding-left:0px;width:8px;padding-right:0px;display:inline-block;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;word-wrap:break-word !important;height:8px;border-right-color:#ff8124;border-left-color:#ff8124;padding-top:0px;border-radius:100%;\"></section></section></section></section><br class=\"Apple-interchange-newline\" />','uploads/image/20151118/1447845836.jpg','','172','167','1447257600','true','','0');

28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px 宋体;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	近日，一个名为“百事手机”的新浪微博账号公布了百事可乐要做手机的消息，该微博称，10月20日百事公司将公布更多关于百事手机的信息。而目前有关此事的发布会邀请函已向媒体发出。据记者了解，该微博号是由深圳玩疯科技有限公司注册。这家公司成立于2011年，主营业务为手机及配件研发、设计、生产及销售。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px 宋体;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	<img style=\"border-bottom:medium none;border-left:medium none;padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font-family:\'Microsoft Yahei\', Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti, sans-serif, 瀹嬩綋;max-width:100%;height:auto !important;border-top:medium none;border-right:medium none;padding-top:0px;\" src=\"https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/lBH8nAFmdea4nibR6yxFQO6PR6wyCia9518TTSibiaiassYQ7oTwMXo6j9YdSCUPTj7Eh1vk8An4QP0BV4WHC83Dc9w/0?wx_fmt=png\" _src=\"https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/lBH8nAFmdea4nibR6yxFQO6PR6wyCia9518TTSibiaiassYQ7oTwMXo6j9YdSCUPTj7Eh1vk8An4QP0BV4WHC83Dc9w/0?wx_fmt=png\" data-w=\"\" data-ratio=\"0.43478260869565216\" data-type=\"png\" data-s=\"300,640\" /> \r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px 宋体;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	昨天，百事可乐中国公司给记者发来声明确认：百事可乐与一个特许合作伙伴正在计划于未来几个月内向中国市场推出手机及配件。此项工作仅限于在中国市场，与百事可乐近期在全球发布的特许经营的产品相似，包括服装及饰物。对于该特许合作伙伴是否指上述深圳玩疯科技有限公司，另外百事方面推出的特许服装等产品采用何种模式，具体目标是什么等问题，百事方面没有透露。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px 宋体;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	有意思的是，谈到推出手机的动因，百事可乐否认计划进入手机制造行业，“百事可乐始终引领文化发展的前沿，如今科技是消费者互动核心的主要文化支柱之一。百事可乐没有计划进入手机制造行业，在这个互联网的时代，我们致力于通过此种方式与中国消费者保持紧密联系，通过创新的方式推动我们的品牌”。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px 宋体;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	尽管百事方面对产品具体信息未有披露，但目前各种信息显示，百事可乐公司即将推出的手机型号为“百事P1”，定价1299元，采用全金属机身，厚度为7.7mm，采用5.5英寸1080p屏幕。手机搭载1.7GHz MT6592处理器，2GB内存+16GB机身存储，1300万像素+500万像素组合，内置3000mAh电池，支持双卡双待(移动三频)，运行Android5.1系统。记者胡笑红\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px 宋体;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	做手机重在推广品牌\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px 宋体;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	“百事可乐推手机与推广他们的产品应该没有太大的关系，更重要的是要推广百事的品牌。”北京志起未来营销咨询集团董事长李志起表示，这种模式与百事可乐十多年前在中国推出的“百事运动”有异曲同工之处。\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px 宋体;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	十几年前，百事可乐通过特许授权的形式，授权广东百事高企业发展有限公司研发经营百事运动服饰。“百事的逻辑很简单，服装门店开张，百事自己不仅不需要资金投入，相反通过特许计划，一方面可以收取管理费、合作分成，更重要的这些门店及服装相当于给百事做了巨额的免费广告，百事也无形中增加了更多与目标消费群体直接接触互动的机会。”\r\n</p>\r\n<p style=\"padding-bottom:0px;widows:1;text-transform:none;background-color:#ffffff;text-indent:0px;margin:0px 0px 28px;padding-left:0px;padding-right:0px;font:16px/28px 宋体;white-space:normal;letter-spacing:normal;color:#000000;clear:both;word-spacing:0px;padding-top:0px;-webkit-text-stroke-width:0px;font-stretch:normal;\">\r\n	“这种品牌授权其实是百事的品牌经营模式。”李志起表示，卖可乐是产品经营，而通过合作加强品牌营销，是为了提高品牌价值。“据了解，百事内部有专门负责品牌特许授权的部门。”李志起表示，百事运动就做得比较成功，此次百事推手机目的依然如此，其定位一定是85后、90后的年轻人，目的是通过多元化的产品，拉拢新兴消费群体，刷出百事品牌的存在感。\r\n</p>','uploads/image/20151118/1447846782.jpg','','205','49','1447257600','true','','0');
